title: Wli Waterfalls & Mountain Adventure
description: An exciting two-day trip to the Volta Region to hike to Ghana's highest waterfalls and explore the beautiful mountain scenery.

itinerary.title: Journey to the Volta & Waterfall Hike
itinerary.details:
*   Morning pickup from your location in Accra.
*   Scenic drive to the Volta Region, passing through lush landscapes.
*   Arrive at Wli and check into your guesthouse.
*   Afternoon hike to the spectacular Wli Waterfalls, Ghana's highest falls. You can swim in the cool, refreshing pool at the base.
*   Evening relaxation and dinner.

itinerary.title: Monkey Sanctuary & Return to Accra
itinerary.details:
*   Morning visit to the Tafi Atome Monkey Sanctuary to interact with friendly Mona monkeys.
*   Begin the journey back to Accra.
*   Stop for a local lunch en route.
*   Arrive back in Accra in the late afternoon.

title: Cape Coast & Elmina History Tour
description: A profound journey into Ghana's past. Visit the historic slave castles of Cape Coast and Elmina, and walk the Kakum canopy.

itinerary.title: Coastal Drive & Kakum Canopy Walk
itinerary.details:
*   Depart from Accra and drive along the scenic coast to the Central Region.
*   Visit Kakum National Park and experience the thrilling canopy walkway, suspended 40 meters above the rainforest floor.
*   Check into your hotel in Cape Coast/Elmina.
itinerary.overnight: Hotel in Cape Coast or Elmina

itinerary.title: The Slave Castles
itinerary.details:
*   In the morning, take a guided tour of the historic Cape Coast Castle, a former slave trading post.
*   In the afternoon, visit Elmina Castle, the oldest European building in sub-Saharan Africa, and learn about its somber history.
*   Explore the bustling fishing town of Elmina.
itinerary.overnight: Hotel in Cape Coast or Elmina

itinerary.title: Assin Manso & Return Journey
itinerary.details:
*   Visit Assin Manso, the site of the 'Last Bath' where enslaved Africans were bathed before being sent to the castles.
*   Participate in a solemn wreath-laying and naming ceremony.
*   Begin your journey back to Accra, arriving in the evening.

title: Mole National Park Safari
description: Experience the thrill of a safari in Ghana's largest wildlife refuge. See elephants, antelopes, and hundreds of bird species.

itinerary.title: Fly North & Settle In
itinerary.details:
*   Morning flight from Accra to Tamale.
*   Our guide will meet you at the airport and begin the drive to Mole National Park.
*   Check into your hotel (Mole Motel or Zaina Lodge).
*   Afternoon jeep safari to get your first glimpse of the park's wildlife.

itinerary.title: Full Day Safari Experience
itinerary.details:
*   Early morning walking safari with an armed ranger to track elephants on foot.
*   Return to the hotel for breakfast and relaxation by the pool, which overlooks a watering hole.
*   Late afternoon jeep safari to explore a different area of the park and see more animals as they come out to graze.

itinerary.title: Local Culture & Return to Tamale
itinerary.details:
*   Optional final morning safari.
*   Visit the nearby Larabanga Mosque, the oldest mosque in Ghana, and the mystical stone.
*   Drive back to Tamale and check into your hotel.
*   Explore the Tamale Central Market.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details:
*   Enjoy a final northern breakfast.
*   Transfer to Tamale Airport for your flight back to Accra.

title: Accra City Vibe Tour
description: Discover the vibrant heart of Ghana's capital. Explore bustling markets, historical landmarks, and the trendy arts scene of Accra.

itinerary.title: A Day in Accra
itinerary.details:
*   **Morning:** Visit the Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park & Mausoleum and Independence Square, the heart of Ghana's history.
*   **Mid-day:** Explore the bustling Makola Market to experience the city's vibrant trade. Then head to Jamestown to see the lighthouse and the local fishing community.
*   **Afternoon:** Visit the W.E.B. Du Bois Centre for Pan-African Culture. End the day with some souvenir shopping at the Arts Centre.
*   Drop off at your hotel or preferred location.

title: Coastal Heritage & Culture
description: A week-long immersive journey into Ghana's coastal history and vibrant culture, from Accra to the poignant slave castles.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Accra
itinerary.details:
*   Airport pickup and transfer to your hotel.
*   Welcome drink and briefing on the upcoming tour.
*   Depending on arrival time, a short orientation of the neighborhood.

itinerary.title: Accra City Tour
itinerary.details:
*   Explore historic Accra, visiting Independence Square, Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park, and the W.E.B. Du Bois Centre for Pan-African Culture.
*   Experience the vibrant energy of Jamestown and its iconic lighthouse.

itinerary.title: Journey to Cape Coast & Kakum
itinerary.details:
*   Drive from Accra to the Central Region.
*   Visit Kakum National Park for an exhilarating walk on the canopy walkway high above the rainforest.

itinerary.title: The Slave Castles
itinerary.details:
*   A sobering and educational day visiting both Cape Coast Castle and Elmina Castle.
*   Learn about the history of the transatlantic slave trade from knowledgeable local guides.

itinerary.title: Assin Manso & Reflection
itinerary.details:
*   Journey to Assin Manso, the site of the 'Last Bath' where enslaved Africans were prepared for their journey.
*   A day for reflection and understanding the historical significance of the region.

itinerary.title: Beach Leisure Day
itinerary.details:
*   Relax and rejuvenate on the beautiful beaches of the Central Region.
*   Enjoy the sea breeze, swim, or simply relax at a beachfront restaurant.

itinerary.title: Return to Accra & Departure
itinerary.details:
*   Enjoy a final coastal breakfast before driving back to Accra.
*   Last-minute souvenir shopping at the Arts Centre.
*   Transfer to the airport for your departure.

title: Ultimate Ghana Experience
description: The complete package. A comprehensive tour covering Ghana's diverse landscapes, from northern safaris to the cultural heartlands and coastal castles.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Welcome
itinerary.details: Arrive at Kotoka Airport, Accra. Transfer to your hotel for a welcome briefing and dinner.

itinerary.title: Fly to Tamale & Mole Safari
itinerary.details: Take a domestic flight to Tamale. Drive to Mole National Park and enjoy an afternoon jeep safari.

itinerary.title: Journey to Ashanti Kingdom
itinerary.details: Morning safari at Mole. Depart for Kumasi, stopping at the beautiful Kintampo Waterfalls en route.

itinerary.title: Ashanti Craft Villages
itinerary.details: Explore the rich culture of the Ashanti people by visiting the Kente weaving village of Adanwomase and the Adinkra stamping village of Ntonso.

itinerary.title: Kumasi City Tour
itinerary.details: Visit the Manhyia Palace Museum (former home of the Ashanti King), the Okomfo Anokye Sword site, and the bustling Kejetia Market.

itinerary.title: Drive to the Coast
itinerary.details: A scenic drive from Kumasi to Cape Coast. Check into your hotel and relax by the ocean.

itinerary.title: Kakum & Cape Coast Castle
itinerary.details: Experience the Kakum National Park canopy walk in the morning. In the afternoon, take a powerful tour of the Cape Coast Castle.

itinerary.title: Elmina Castle & Return to Accra
itinerary.details: Visit the historic Elmina Castle. Afterward, begin the drive back to Accra.

itinerary.title: Accra Leisure & Arts
itinerary.details: A relaxed day in Accra. Visit the Arts Centre for souvenir shopping or explore the trendy neighborhood of Osu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details: Enjoy a final Ghanaian breakfast before being transferred to the airport for your flight home.

title: Grand Festivals of Ghana
description: An incredible cultural immersion timed with Ghana's most vibrant festivals. Experience the art of Chale Wote and the royal traditions of Akwasidae.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Accra
itinerary.details: Welcome to Ghana! Settle into your hotel and prepare for an amazing cultural journey.

itinerary.title: Accra City Exploration
itinerary.details: Tour of Accra's key historical sites, including Jamestown and the Du Bois Centre, to set the cultural context.

itinerary.title: Chale Wote Street Art Festival
itinerary.details: Spend the day immersed in the vibrant Chale Wote festival in Jamestown. Experience street art, music, dance, and fashion.

itinerary.title: Journey to Kumasi
itinerary.details: Travel to Kumasi, the heart of the Ashanti Kingdom. Check into your hotel and relax.

itinerary.title: Akwasidae Festival
itinerary.details: Witness the splendor of the Akwasidae festival at Manhyia Palace, where the Ashanti King sits in state and receives homage from his sub-chiefs.

itinerary.title: Ashanti Craft Villages
itinerary.details: Explore the craft villages of Adanwomase (Kente) and Ntonso (Adinkra), learning the traditional crafts firsthand.

itinerary.title: Drive to Cape Coast
itinerary.details: Travel from the Ashanti heartland to the historic coast. Settle into your hotel with views of the Atlantic.

itinerary.title: Cape Coast Castle
itinerary.details: Take a deeply moving tour of the Cape Coast Castle to understand its pivotal role in the history of the region.

itinerary.title: Kakum National Park
itinerary.details: Walk among the treetops on the Kakum National Park canopy walk, a nature-filled adventure.

itinerary.title: Return to Accra
itinerary.details: Leisurely drive back to Accra. Enjoy a farewell dinner at a restaurant with live Ghanaian music.

itinerary.title: Art & Shopping
itinerary.details: Visit a local art gallery and spend time at the Arts Centre for last-minute souvenir shopping.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details: Enjoy a final breakfast and transfer to the airport for your departure.

title: December in Ghana: The Ultimate Experience
description: Experience the legendary 'Detty December' in Ghana. This tour is the perfect blend of parties, culture, history, and beach relaxation.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Accra Nightlife Intro
itinerary.details: Arrive at Kotoka Airport, Accra. Transfer to your hotel. In the evening, ease into the vibe with dinner and cocktails in the trendy Osu neighborhood.

itinerary.title: History & Culture Grounding
itinerary.details: Morning tour of Accra's historical sites: Jamestown, Nkrumah Memorial Park. Afternoon visit to the Arts Centre for souvenir shopping.

itinerary.title: Afrofuture/Afrochella Experience
itinerary.details: Full day dedicated to one of December's flagship music and culture festivals. Enjoy the music, art installations, and fashion.

itinerary.title: Cape Coast Day Trip
itinerary.details: A sobering and essential trip to Cape Coast Castle to connect with Ghana's history. Return to Accra in the evening.

itinerary.title: Beach Relaxation & Party
itinerary.details: Relax at Labadi Beach. Enjoy horseback riding, local food, and music. As evening approaches, the beach comes alive with parties and bonfires.

itinerary.title: Fashion & Food Tour
itinerary.details: Explore local fashion houses and designer stores. In the evening, embark on a food tour to taste Ghana's diverse culinary delights, from street food to upscale dining.

itinerary.title: Aburi Mountains Escape
itinerary.details: A day trip to the cooler Aburi Botanical Gardens for a relaxing break from the city buzz. Enjoy the serene environment and beautiful landscapes.

itinerary.title: Concert or Live Music Night
itinerary.details: Attend a major concert or a live music session at a venue like +233 Grill & Bar. We will check the event calendar and secure tickets for the best show in town.

itinerary.title: New Year's Eve Celebrations
itinerary.details: Day of leisure to prepare for the night. We'll arrange entry to one of Accra's top New Year's Eve parties or a fireworks display event at the beach.

itinerary.title: Relaxed Departure
itinerary.details: Enjoy a late brunch. Depending on your flight time, one last stroll before we transfer you to the airport for your departure.
